QuestData.Title: Enough Is Enough
QuestData.Description:
Grumpy or not, Theramus has a job to do. While he hides inside, he can't see the consequences of his absence.
Let's go together. We'll show him the evidence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the evidence of Lilac Ramble's damage to Theramus.
QuestData.RewardText: ...I think it worked? He left the cave!
